stanza.line: Let me confess that we two must be twaintwain
Although our undivided loves are oneone
So shall those blots that do with me remainremain
Without thy help by me be borne alonealone
In our two loves there is but one respectrespect
Though in our lives a separable spitespite
Which though it alter not love sole effecteffect
Yet doth it steal sweet hours from love delightdelight
I may not evermore acknowledge theethee
Lest my bewailed guilt should do thee shameshame
Nor thou with public kindness honour meme
Unless thou take that honour from thy namename
But do not so I love thee in such sortsort
As thou being mine mine is thy good reportreport
